column3: Traffic;Kandal (chnchannel): 3 people were injured in a traffic accident between a motorbike and a tuk-tuk  on Sunday
column6: 2018 at 11:20 am in Prek Svay II village
column12: was riding a yellow  DUCATI motorcycle at  high speed when he collided with a tuk-tuk driven by Meas Veasna
column15: Khmer. The italian injured his arm
column16: the tuk-tuk driver injured his leg and  monk
column17: who was a passenger in the tuk-tuk was also slightly hurt.------The injured were sent to a hospital in Phnom Penh. Kien Svay district police have impounded the vehicles and will investigate further
column18: according to the law. No images of the wrecked motors as yet.------http://chnchannel.com/chnnewws/170459------
